::Grounded::
Grounded walks into the room trying to find his way around this base
and hears part of the conversation between Nighlight and Aerotaur.
"Would you by anychance be talkign about that large bot Windlord.

> Nightlight::
>

inside the base and  I don't know what he could do if he do4esn't
change... and I'm afraid that I couldn't help so much... I'm not a
good fighter "
